leaveInvitedList(String, String, OnSuccessListener<Void>, OnFailureListener) - Method in class com.example.myapplication.data.firebase.FirebaseEventRepository
This method removes users from the invited list for a given event The Method performs the following: - The specified notificationList document is updated to remove the user from the "invited" and "all" lists.
